text: On a side note does anyone know why they cut out most of the interactions with other animal/villagers? It used to be that you would always do favors for them and got to know the characters that way. I believe that the previous game in the series got rid of this and I was hoping that it would be back in New Horizons but it isn't. :(

text: Thank you for posting a song from New Horizons. After a really bad month of March with my grandma passing away, this game could not have come out at a more perfect time.  I decided to name my island Ryoshima keeping in line with my theme of naming my Animal Crossing towns/island after locales in Okami/Okamiden.
author: Eric C.

text: I'm sorry about your grandma. Ryoshima is a great choice!
author: SupraDarky

text: @SupraDarky thanks for your kind regards.  I've already put 150 hours into New Horizons.  It's been a great game to help me take my mind off things.
author: Eric C.

text: I really feel bad. I hope things get better for you
author: The Purple Warrior

text: @The Purple Warrior thanks for that.    I have grieved, but I miss her alot since she was my last living grandparent.
author: Eric C.

text:
What you do is something simple, but extremely influential. Doing my own VGM list and following others has helped me discover games I would have otherwise never considered playing.
And even though I don't have the time and willpower anymore, you still keep uploading choice tracks to spread the word of wonderful games or unique opinions, and keep everyone's spirits up.
I always listen to your library of chosen VGM to listen to as I draw, and I often find myself surprised by great songs I've never heard before.
Even now in this dark time, you make an excellent choice to put something as evocative and pleasant as this for your #2400. I think this small thing's gonna be remembered for a long time by all of us.
I failed in something so simple as making my own list, but you still keep yours going strong. Well done. ^^
Keep up the good work.
author: Medal Melodies

text: Thanks for the good words, but you should absolutely not consider your own list a failure just because you stopped. You played your own part in all this. Cheers!
author: SupraDarky

text: I will try your playlist since I already listened to SD's so many times ! With more than a thousand entries it sounds promising !
author: Aganhim

text: @Aganhim Thanks! I hope you enjoy!
author: Medal Melodies

text:
I feel the same way as well. This channel and the games I’ve played over the course of my lifetime have inspired me to create music playlist of my own.

Although, with over more than 2000 tracks saved, it can be tough to manage. I pull through though, and try to update it constantly.

author: chokureload

text: I've been working on the #2400 video as I usually do for x00 uploads, but it just didn't feel right with everything that's been going on. I pretty much had the blank page syndrome, so I decided to go with something simple. I will keep the other one for #2500 instead (it was a different franchise). Animal Crossing not only deserves a x00 spot, but the timing is actually perfect with New Horizons releasing during such an unprecedented time of social distancing. We are all in this together despite the distance, we will get through this and I truly wish you all the best! I get so many great messages of support regarding the list helping people with the situation while they work from home and that only serves as additional motivation. Uploads will be resuming as usual.
author: SupraDarky

text: Meanwhile, the video game tournaments keep going with a new poll every 2 days. You can follow them on the channel's Community page. The PS1 tournament is about to wrap up!
author: SupraDarky

text: Thanks, we're all in the same boat. Videogame soundtracks are part of my life and what you've been doing for such a long time is very significant to me, and to many others. Sorry for my bad english hahahah love from Italy<3
